name: Gull River Escape: Nordic Spa
descriptionShort: Escape to this spacious 5-bedroom, 3.5-bath retreat steps from Minden’s famous tubing river. Start your day floating down the gentle currents, then unwind in the Nordic spa, featuring a sauna, hot tub, and cold plunge. Enjoy endless entertainment with a ping pong table, retro Ms. Pac-Man arcade, and tons of board games.
descriptionLong: Escape to this spacious 5-bedroom, 3.5-bath retreat steps from Minden’s famous tubing river. Start your day floating down the gentle currents, then unwind in the Nordic spa, featuring a sauna, hot tub, and cold plunge.

Enjoy endless entertainment with a ping pong table, retro Ms. Pac-Man arcade, and tons of board games. Cozy living spaces and a scenic outdoor deck make it perfect for families and friends. Book now and create unforgettable memories!
shortDescription: Spacious 5-bedroom retreat in Minden with Nordic spa, games, and river access.
